control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs [Assignment: organization-defined security safeguards] to ensure that only [Assignment: organization-defined individuals or information systems] receive the [Assignment: organization-defined information, information system components, or devices].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system maintains a separate execution domain for each thread in [Assignment: organization-defined multi-threaded processing].

Control Statement: The organization employs [Assignment: organization-defined security safeguards] to ensure that only [Assignment: organization-defined individuals or information systems] receive the [Assignment: organization-defined information, information system components, or devices].
